name: part_005
file: tmp_【#癒月ちょこ3周年】３周年記念3D配信⚡重大告知あり！【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [spHKQDaz0C0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Yuzuki Choco transitions from a medical exam room to a sweets-themed room.
Yuzuki Choco greets the audience in the new room and checks if she's visible.
Yuzuki Choco introduces the 'Request Lottery Project' (リクエストくじ引き企画).
A list of requests from various Hololive members is displayed on screen.
Yuzuki Choco draws the first lot, which turns out to be Usada Pekora's request.
Yuzuki Choco prepares for Pekora's request: 'Sexy lines in a female leopard pose'.
Yuzuki Choco performs the sexy lines in the requested pose.
Yuzuki Choco draws the second lot: Tokoyami Towa's request for a 'demonic pose and lines'.

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: One, two...!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: はーい！ということで...
subtitles.english: Hi everyone! And so...

subtitles.original: どうかしら？皆様見えてる？
subtitles.english: How is it? Can everyone see me?

subtitles.original: 大丈夫？見えてます？
subtitles.english: Is it okay? Can you see me?

subtitles.original: はーい！ということで、続いては
subtitles.english: Hi! So, next up is the...

subtitles.original: リクエストくじ引き企画でございます！
subtitles.english: ...Request Lottery project!

subtitles.original: このコーナーでは、総勢９名のホロメンから、まぁわたくしにね、
subtitles.english: In this corner, from a total of 9 Hololive members...

subtitles.original: してほしいこと、言ってほしいことを
subtitles.english: ...I received requests for things

subtitles.original: リクエストいただきました！
subtitles.english: they want me to do or say!

subtitles.original: リクエストくじ引き企画
subtitles.english: Request Lottery Project

subtitles.original: くじ引きで引いたお題のリクエストに、ちょこ先生がどんどん答えていくので、
subtitles.english: Choco-sensei will be answering the requests drawn by lottery one after another.

subtitles.original: 皆様ぜひぜひ、くじ引きの内容とかもね、
subtitles.english: So everyone, please look forward to

subtitles.original: いろいろと楽しみに待っててくださーい！ということで、
subtitles.english: the contents of the lottery! And so...

subtitles.original: ではね、早速１つ目引いていこうかしら？
subtitles.english: Well then, shall I draw the first one right away?

subtitles.original: どうしようかな？
subtitles.english: Which one should I pick?

subtitles.original: まあその前にね、ちょっとお題があるらしいんで、
subtitles.english: Well, before that, it seems there's a list of topics...

subtitles.original: こちらのほうをご覧ください！
subtitles.english: So please take a look at this!

subtitles.original: 皆様から募集したリクエストはこちら！
subtitles.english: Here are the requests I gathered from everyone!

subtitles.original: まあまあまあね、
subtitles.english: Well, well, well...

subtitles.original: 意外と皆様いっぱいね、ご用意いただいちゃったみたいで、
subtitles.english: It seems that everyone surprisingly prepared quite a lot of them.

subtitles.original: いやー、さあさあさあ、これからね、誰のが当たるのか楽しみでございますわね！
subtitles.english: Oh boy, now I'm looking forward to seeing whose request gets drawn!

subtitles.original: それでは早速引いていこうかな？
subtitles.english: Now then, shall I start drawing?

subtitles.original: うーん、
subtitles.english: Hmm...

subtitles.original: 最初は、じゃーあ、
subtitles.english: The first one will be... let's see...

subtitles.original: こちら！
subtitles.english: This one!
Number two!

subtitles.original: それでは２番のリクエストお願いします！
subtitles.english: Now, let's see the request for number two!

subtitles.original: ②女豹のポーズでセクシーなセリフ
subtitles.english: ② Sexy lines in a female leopard pose

subtitles.original: お、２番はぺこら様！
subtitles.english: Oh, number two is Pekora-sama!

subtitles.original: 女豹のポーズでセクシーなセリフ！
subtitles.english: Sexy lines in a female leopard pose!

subtitles.original: なるほど、
subtitles.english: I see.

subtitles.original: 女豹ポーズね！
subtitles.english: A female leopard pose, huh?

subtitles.original: まあ、ちょこからした、もう簡単なポーズですよ、もう。
subtitles.english: Well, for Choco, that's such an easy pose already.

subtitles.original: ぺこら様ったらそんな簡単なポーズで大丈夫？
subtitles.english: Is Pekora-sama really okay with such an easy pose?

subtitles.original: よいしょ...
subtitles.english: Up we go...

subtitles.original: 女豹だから、四つん這いになって、
subtitles.english: Since it's a female leopard, I'll get on all fours...

subtitles.original: 片手挙げて、こうかしらね？
subtitles.english: Raise one hand... like this, maybe?

subtitles.original: うーん...
subtitles.english: Hmm...

subtitles.original: こんな感じ？見えてる？
subtitles.english: Like this? Can you see?

subtitles.original: これで、セクシーなセリフでしょう？
subtitles.english: And with this, I do the sexy lines, right?

subtitles.original: それでは、そんな癒月ちょこのセクシーなセリフまで、
subtitles.english: Now then, for Yuzuki Choco's sexy lines...
3, 2, 1, Action!

subtitles.original: そんなに見つめちゃって、大丈夫？
subtitles.english: Is it okay for you to be staring at me that much?

subtitles.original: ちょこのこと、もっと好きになっちゃうよ？
subtitles.english: You're going to fall in love with Choco even more, you know?

subtitles.original: まあ、ちょこは、君が思っている以上に
subtitles.english: Well, Choco likes you even more

subtitles.original: 君のこと、もっと好きだけどね。
subtitles.english: than you think she does.

subtitles.original: ねえ、食べてもいいかな？
subtitles.english: Hey, is it okay if I eat you up?

subtitles.original: にゃーんにゃんっ♪
subtitles.english: Nyaan, nyan♪

subtitles.original: はい！ということで、
subtitles.english: Yes! And with that...

subtitles.original: １つ目のリクエストはこれで完了ということでございますかね！
subtitles.english: the first request is now complete!

subtitles.original: はーい！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: それではね、次のくじ引き引いてみようかな？
subtitles.english: Now then, let me try drawing the next lot!

subtitles.original: ぺいっ！
subtitles.english: Hup!

subtitles.original: 次は、
subtitles.english: Next is...
Number seven!

subtitles.original: ⑦悪魔的ポーズとセリフが欲しい!!!!
subtitles.english: ⑦ I want a demonic pose and lines!!!!

subtitles.original: あ、これはトワ様ですね！
subtitles.english: Oh, this one is from Towa-sama!

subtitles.original: 悪魔的ポーズとセリフが欲しい！！！
subtitles.english: I want a demonic pose and lines!!!

subtitles.original: いやもうトワ様ったら、ま確かにね、トワ様まだ小悪魔だからね、
subtitles.english: My, Towa-sama... Well, it's true she's still just an imp...

subtitles.original: 本物の悪魔のセクシーゼリフをトワ様にもね、聞かせてあげましょうかね！
subtitles.english: So I'll have to let her hear a real demon's sexy lines too!

subtitles.original: それじゃ行きますか！怪しいBGMもお願いします！
subtitles.english: Well then, shall we go? Please give me some mysterious BGM!
